tasks.title: Phase 1: Foundation Infrastructure
tasks.description: Build core infrastructure including GCP setup, FastAPI server, PostgreSQL/TimescaleDB, game telemetry pipeline, Celery task queue, authentication, and CI/CD
tasks.details: Deliverables: GCP project setup, FastAPI server with basic endpoints, PostgreSQL and TimescaleDB setup, Game telemetry ingestion pipeline, Celery task queue, Basic authentication system, CI/CD pipeline. Timeline: Weeks 1-8. Team: 4 engineers (3 backend, 1 DevOps)
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for API endpoints, integration tests for database operations, load tests for telemetry ingestion, CI/CD pipeline validation

subtasks.title: GCP Project Setup and Configuration
subtasks.description: Set up GCP project, configure regions, enable required APIs, set up IAM roles and service accounts
subtasks.details: Enable Cloud Run, Cloud SQL, Cloud Storage, Cloud Speech-to-Text, Vertex AI APIs. Configure IAM roles for service accounts. Set up billing and quotas.

subtasks.title: FastAPI Server Foundation
subtasks.description: Create FastAPI application structure with basic endpoints, middleware, error handling, and documentation
subtasks.details: Set up FastAPI project structure, implement authentication endpoints, telemetry endpoints, health check endpoints. Configure CORS, logging, and OpenAPI documentation.

subtasks.title: PostgreSQL and TimescaleDB Setup
subtasks.description: Deploy Cloud SQL PostgreSQL with TimescaleDB extension, design schema, and implement database models
subtasks.details: Set up Cloud SQL instance with high availability, install TimescaleDB extension, create database schema for students, teachers, telemetry, transcripts, assessments. Implement SQLAlchemy models.

subtasks.title: Game Telemetry Ingestion Pipeline
subtasks.description: Implement Kafka event streaming for game telemetry with batch and streaming processing capabilities
subtasks.details: Set up Kafka cluster, implement telemetry event schema, create producers/consumers, implement batching logic, add data validation and error handling.

subtasks.title: Celery Task Queue Setup
subtasks.description: Configure Celery with Redis for async task processing including transcription, analysis, and inference jobs
subtasks.details: Set up Redis instance, configure Celery workers, implement task definitions for STT, linguistic analysis, skill inference. Add monitoring and retry logic.

subtasks.title: Authentication and Authorization System
subtasks.description: Implement OAuth 2.0 with JWT tokens and role-based access control
subtasks.details: Set up OAuth 2.0 flow, implement JWT token generation/validation, create user roles (teacher, admin, student, counselor), implement RBAC middleware, add audit logging.

subtasks.title: CI/CD Pipeline Implementation
subtasks.description: Set up GitHub Actions for automated testing, building, and deployment to GCP Cloud Run
subtasks.details: Create GitHub Actions workflows, implement automated testing, configure Docker builds, set up blue-green deployments, implement automated rollback on errors.

tasks.title: Phase 2: NLP and Skill Inference
tasks.description: Implement speech-to-text, linguistic analysis, behavioral feature extraction, XGBoost model training, evidence extraction, and reasoning generation
tasks.details: Deliverables: Google Cloud STT integration, Linguistic analysis pipeline, Behavioral feature extraction, XGBoost model training and validation, Evidence extraction system, Reasoning generation (LLM integration), Model monitoring and alerting. Timeline: Weeks 9-16. Team: 4 engineers (2 ML, 1 backend, 1 data scientist)
tasks.testStrategy: Transcription accuracy tests (>95% target), Model validation (r ≥ 0.70 with teacher ratings), Feature extraction unit tests, End-to-end inference pipeline tests

subtasks.title: Google Cloud Speech-to-Text Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate GCP STT API for classroom audio transcription with >95% accuracy
subtasks.details: Implement audio upload to Cloud Storage, configure STT API with optimal settings, implement streaming and batch transcription, add confidence scoring and quality checks.

subtasks.title: Linguistic Feature Extraction Pipeline
subtasks.description: Build NLP pipeline to extract empathy markers, problem-solving language, and other linguistic features from transcripts
subtasks.details: Implement LIWC category extraction, syntactic pattern analysis, discourse marker detection, sentiment analysis, word embeddings generation using Hugging Face Transformers.

subtasks.title: Behavioral Feature Extraction
subtasks.description: Extract behavioral features from game telemetry including task completion, retry patterns, and collaboration indicators
subtasks.details: Aggregate telemetry events, calculate task efficiency metrics, extract persistence patterns, identify collaboration behaviors, compute distraction resistance scores.

subtasks.title: XGBoost Model Training and Validation
subtasks.description: Train and validate XGBoost models for each non-academic skill with r ≥ 0.70 correlation to teacher ratings
subtasks.details: Prepare training data with human-coded ground truth (α ≥ 0.80), train separate models for empathy, adaptability, problem-solving, self-regulation, resilience, communication, collaboration. Validate against teacher ratings.

subtasks.title: Evidence Extraction System
subtasks.description: Implement system to extract and rank supporting evidence from linguistic, behavioral, and contextual sources
subtasks.details: Select representative evidence from transcripts and telemetry, implement relevance ranking, add timestamp attribution, format evidence for display in dashboards.

subtasks.title: Reasoning Generation with LLM
subtasks.description: Integrate OpenAI GPT-4 API to generate human-readable explanations for skill assessments
subtasks.details: Implement prompt templates for each skill, integrate GPT-4 API, generate 2-3 sentence explanations linking evidence to scores, add confidence estimates.

subtasks.title: Model Monitoring and Alerting
subtasks.description: Set up monitoring for model performance, drift detection, and automated alerts
subtasks.details: Implement prediction logging, track accuracy metrics over time, detect model drift, set up alerts for performance degradation, create dashboards for ML ops.

tasks.title: Phase 3: Dashboards and Integration
tasks.description: Build React-based teacher, administrator, and student dashboards with SIS integration, RBAC, reporting, and user management
tasks.details: Deliverables: Teacher dashboard (React), Administrator dashboard (React), Student portal (React), SIS integration (OneRoster, Clever, ClassLink), Role-based access control, Reporting features, User management. Timeline: Weeks 17-24. Team: 4 engineers (2 frontend, 1 backend, 1 product)
tasks.testStrategy: UI component tests, User acceptance testing with teachers, SIS integration tests, RBAC security tests, Dashboard performance tests (<2s load time)

subtasks.title: Teacher Dashboard - Core Views
subtasks.description: Build React-based teacher dashboard with class overview, student list, and filtering capabilities
subtasks.details: Implement class overview with skill distribution, sortable/filterable student list, skill score visualizations, responsive design with <2s load time.

subtasks.title: Teacher Dashboard - Student Detail Views
subtasks.description: Implement detailed student profile views with evidence, reasoning, trends, and alerts
subtasks.details: Create student detail page showing all skills with evidence excerpts, reasoning explanations, temporal trends, alerts for students needing support.

subtasks.title: Administrator Dashboard
subtasks.description: Build school/district-level dashboard with aggregated metrics, trends, and equity analysis
subtasks.details: Implement school-wide skill distributions, trend analysis over time periods, demographic breakdowns for equity analysis, heatmaps, exportable reports.

subtasks.title: Student Portal
subtasks.description: Create student-facing portal showing personal skill profile and progress
subtasks.details: Implement student skill visualization, growth-oriented feedback display, achievement tracking, accessible and age-appropriate design.

subtasks.title: School Information System Integration
subtasks.description: Implement OneRoster, Clever, and ClassLink integrations with CSV fallback for roster synchronization
subtasks.details: Implement OneRoster API client, Clever integration, ClassLink integration, CSV import fallback, automated daily sync, data validation and error handling.

subtasks.title: Role-Based Access Control Implementation
subtasks.description: Enforce RBAC across all dashboards with audit logging
subtasks.details: Implement role checking middleware, enforce data access restrictions (teachers see own students, admins see school/district), create audit logs for all data access.

subtasks.title: Reporting and Export Features
subtasks.description: Implement report generation and data export in PDF and CSV formats
subtasks.details: Create report templates for different stakeholders, implement PDF generation, CSV export functionality, scheduled report generation capabilities.

tasks.title: Phase 4: Testing, Optimization, and Launch
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing, performance optimization, security audit, pilot deployment, feedback integration, and launch preparation
tasks.details: Deliverables: Comprehensive testing (unit, integration, end-to-end), Performance optimization, Security audit and hardening, Pilot with 1-2 schools, Feedback integration, Launch preparation, Documentation and training. Timeline: Weeks 25-32. Team: 3 engineers (1 QA, 1 DevOps, 1 backend), 1 product manager
tasks.testStrategy: Test coverage >80%, Performance benchmarks met, Security audit pass, Pilot school validation, Educator acceptance survey (80% target)

subtasks.title: Comprehensive Test Suite Development
subtasks.description: Build unit, integration, and end-to-end tests achieving >80% coverage
subtasks.details: Write unit tests for all components, integration tests for API endpoints and pipelines, end-to-end tests for user workflows, achieve >80% test coverage.

subtasks.title: Performance Optimization
subtasks.description: Optimize system performance to meet latency and throughput requirements
subtasks.details: Profile and optimize slow queries, implement caching strategies, optimize ML inference latency, reduce dashboard load times, ensure API p95 <500ms.

subtasks.title: Security Audit and Hardening
subtasks.description: Conduct comprehensive security audit and implement hardening measures for FERPA/COPPA compliance
subtasks.details: Perform security audit, fix vulnerabilities, ensure FERPA/COPPA compliance, implement encryption at rest and in transit, conduct penetration testing, achieve SOC 2 readiness.

subtasks.title: Pilot School Onboarding and Deployment
subtasks.description: Deploy system to 1-2 pilot schools with full support and monitoring
subtasks.details: Select pilot schools, conduct onboarding and training, deploy system, provide ongoing support, monitor system performance and user feedback.

subtasks.title: Pilot Feedback Collection and Integration
subtasks.description: Collect feedback from pilot schools and implement critical improvements
subtasks.details: Conduct teacher surveys (target 80% acceptance), collect student engagement data (target 85%), identify and fix critical issues, implement priority enhancements.

subtasks.title: Validation Study Execution
subtasks.description: Conduct validation study to verify model accuracy, fairness, and reliability
subtasks.details: Execute convergent validity testing (r ≥ 0.70 with teacher ratings), test-retest reliability (r ≥ 0.75), equity analysis (no demographic disparities), responsiveness testing.

subtasks.title: Documentation and Training Materials
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation and training materials for all user types
subtasks.details: Write user guides for teachers, admins, students. Create video tutorials, develop training curriculum, prepare technical documentation, create FAQ and troubleshooting guides.

subtasks.title: Launch Preparation and Go-Live
subtasks.description: Finalize launch preparations and execute go-live plan
subtasks.details: Complete launch checklist, execute production deployment, activate monitoring and alerting, conduct launch communication, provide launch support, monitor initial adoption.

tasks.title: Game-Based Assessment: Flourish Academy
tasks.description: Develop the Unity-based narrative game for stealth assessment of non-academic skills with missions, telemetry, and engagement mechanics
tasks.details: Components: Unity game client, Narrative-driven missions (empathy, adaptability, problem-solving, collaboration, resilience), Character development system, Telemetry logging, Think-aloud prompts, Adaptive difficulty, Accessibility features. Parallel development with other phases.
tasks.testStrategy: Playtesting with students, Telemetry data validation, Student engagement survey (85% target), Accessibility compliance testing, Performance testing on target devices

subtasks.title: Unity Game Foundation and Architecture
subtasks.description: Set up Unity project, core architecture, and game systems framework
subtasks.details: Create Unity project with proper architecture patterns, implement core game systems (scene management, state management, save system), set up development pipeline and version control.

subtasks.title: Narrative Design and Dialogue System
subtasks.description: Develop narrative framework, dialogue system, and story content for all acts
subtasks.details: Write narrative for Acts 1-3 plus epilogue, design character arcs, implement dialogue system with branching conversations, create relationship tracking system.

subtasks.title: Core Mission System Development
subtasks.description: Build mission system and implement the 5 core assessment missions
subtasks.details: Implement mission framework, create Mission 1 (Empathy), Mission 2 (Adaptability), Mission 3 (Problem-Solving), Mission 4 (Collaboration), Mission 5 (Resilience). Include choice consequences and skill assessment hooks.

subtasks.title: Telemetry and Analytics System
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive telemetry logging for all player interactions and decisions
subtasks.details: Create telemetry event schema, implement logging for choices, time spent, mistakes/recovery, collaboration indicators, distraction events. Integrate with backend telemetry pipeline.

subtasks.title: Character System and NPC Interactions
subtasks.description: Develop character system, NPC behaviors, and relationship mechanics
subtasks.details: Create player character customization, implement NPC AI and behaviors, build relationship tracking system, design mentor and classmate characters with distinct personalities.

subtasks.title: Think-Aloud and Metacognitive Prompts
subtasks.description: Implement think-aloud prompt system to capture metacognitive processes during gameplay
subtasks.details: Design contextual think-aloud prompts, implement prompt timing system, create text input interface, log responses with context for analysis.

subtasks.title: Engagement and Progression Systems
subtasks.description: Implement achievement system, progression mechanics, and engagement features
subtasks.details: Create achievement badge system, implement world progression and unlocks, design meaningful choice feedback, build adaptive difficulty system to maintain engagement.

subtasks.title: Accessibility Features Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive accessibility features for inclusive gameplay
subtasks.details: Add multiple difficulty levels, implement text-to-speech for dialogue, ensure color-blind friendly design, add keyboard and controller support, implement adjustable text size, ensure WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.

subtasks.title: Game Testing and Balancing
subtasks.description: Conduct playtesting with target audience and balance game mechanics
subtasks.details: Organize student playtesting sessions, collect engagement feedback (target 85%), validate telemetry data quality, balance mission difficulty, optimize game performance on target devices.
